alert.note: Alert for Trinidad Vicinity, Western Las Animas County Below 7500 Ft; Walsenburg Vicinity, Upper Huerfano River Basin Below 7500 Ft (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 25 at 2:52PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Huerfano and northwestern Las Animas Counties through 315 PM MDT... At 251 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Walsenburg, or 20 miles east of Spring Burn Scar north of Highway 160. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. Very heavy rain was also occurring with this storm. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of east central Huerfano and northwestern Las Animas Counties. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Trinidad Vicinity, Western Las Animas County Below 7500 Ft; Walsenburg Vicinity, Upper Huerfano River Basin Below 7500 Ft
